price: Nuti haala (inni) galateeffataa yookiin mormaa ta'een karaa isa qajeelchine.
arabic: إِنَّا هَدَيۡنَٰهُ ٱلسَّبِيلَ إِمَّا شَاكِرٗا وَإِمَّا كَفُورًا

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: innā hadaynāhu al-sabīla immā shākiran wa-immā kafūran
